1.instruction: Bring the chicken to the room temperature and pat dry the chicken with a paper towel

2.instruction: Mix 1 teaspoon of kosher salt, 1 teaspoon of garlic powder, 1 teaspoon of smoked paprika, 1 teaspoon of onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper

3.instruction: Sprinkle the spices mixture on the chicken

4.instruction: Cook the chicken in the grill for 35 minutes
